mapper.select: select id,pid as pId,simplename as name, ( CASE WHEN (pId = 0 OR pId IS NULL) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) as isOpen from dept

select * from dept
where simplename like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') or fullname like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%')
order by num ASC
select * from dept where FIND_IN_SET(CONCAT('[',#{deptId},']'), pids)
select * from dept where simplename =#{deptName} or fullname=#{deptName}
mapper.update: update dept set version=#{sfxj} where id=#{deptId}
